verses.verse: And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G1137>corners<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2902>holding<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> that the <S%G417>wind<s%> should not <S%G4154>blow<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1186>tree.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G305>ascending<s%> from the <S%G395>east,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God:<s%> and he <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> to the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G91>hurt<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G91>Hurt<s%> not the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> the <S%G1186>trees,<s%> <S%G891>till<s%> we have <S%G4972>sealed<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of our <S%G2316>God<s%> in their <S%G3359>foreheads.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of them which were <S%G4972>sealed:<s%> and there were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> an <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2455>Juda<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%> Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G4502>Reuben<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%> Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G1045>Gad<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%>

Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G768>Aser<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%> Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3508>Nephthalim<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%> Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3128>Manasses<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%>

Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%> Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3017>Levi<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%> Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2466>Issachar<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%>

Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2194>Zabulon<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%> Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%> Of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%>

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>this<s%> I <S%G1492>beheld,<s%> and, <S%G2400>see,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G705>number,<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> and <S%G5443>kindreds,<s%> and <S%G2992>people,<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> with <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robes,<s%> and <S%G5404>palms<s%> in their <S%G5495>hands;<s%>

And <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4991>Salvation<s%> to our <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and to the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and about the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts,<s%> and <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> their <S%G4383>faces,<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G281>Amen:<s%> <S%G2129>Blessing,<s%> and <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> and <S%G2169>thanksgiving,<s%> and <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and <S%G1411>power,<s%> and <S%G2479>might,<s%> be to our <S%G2316>God<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to me, <S%G5101>What<s%> are <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robes?<s%> and from <S%G4159>where<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> they?

And I <S%G2046>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Sir,<s%> you <S%G1492>know.<s%> And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to me, <S%G3778>These<s%> are they which <S%G2064>came<s%> out of <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> and have <S%G4150>washed<s%> their <S%G4749>robes,<s%> and <S%G3021>made<s%> them <S%G3021>white<s%> in the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> are they <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G3000>serve<s%> him <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night<s%> in his <S%G3485>temple:<s%> and he that <S%G2521>sits<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> shall <S%G4637>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> them.

For the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> shall <S%G4165>feed<s%> them, and shall <S%G3594>lead<s%> them to <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G4077>fountains<s%> of <S%G5204>waters:<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G1813>wipe<s%> <S%G1813>away<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%> from their <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>
